partintro.para: Part II of this manual steps the reader through the process of building basic applications using different methodologies.

Due to the broad scope of the Dataphor Toolset, it can be used in many different ways. We support application development paradigms ranging from low-level integration solutions to completely automated development. The tutorials in this part introduce some of these different paradigms:
Data Access Components
This tutorial provides an introduction to the Dataphor Data Access Components and using them in a classic Rapid Application Development paradigm.
Dataphor Development
This tutorial provides a complete application walk-through which illustrates the use of the Dataphor Toolset in the Automated Application Development paradigm.
